patch 8.2.1486: Vim9: readdir() expression doesn't accept bool

Problem:    Vim9: readdir() expression doesn't accept bool.
Solution:   Merge with code for readdirex(). (closes #6737)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1486: Vim9: readdir() expression doesn't accept bool · vim/vim@f8abbf3
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1486: Vim9: readdir() expression doesn't accept bool · vim/vim@f8abbf3
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: readdir() expression doesn't accept bool. Solution: Merge with code for readdirex(). (closes #6737)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/af8822ce085e3bd8edeb52cbb7306ddd42427d39|patch 8.2.1485: Vim9: readdirex() expression doesn't accept bool>
patch 8.2.1485: Vim9: readdirex() expression doesn't accept bool

Problem:    Vim9: readdirex() expression doesn't accept bool.
Solution:   Accept both -1 and bool. (closes #6737)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1485: Vim9: readdirex() expression doesn't accept bool · vim/vim@af8822c
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1485: Vim9: readdirex() expression doesn't accept bool · vim/vim@af8822c
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: readdirex() expression doesn't accept bool. Solution: Accept both -1 and bool. (closes #6737)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/9b02d64cff7664b9643205d6e23b08da688fe87a|patch 8.2.1484: flaky failure in assert_fails()>
patch 8.2.1484: flaky failure in assert_fails()

Problem:    Flaky failure in assert_fails().
Solution:   Only used fourth argument if there is a third argument.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1484: flaky failure in assert_fails() · vim/vim@9b02d64
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1484: flaky failure in assert_fails() · vim/vim@9b02d64
attachments.text: Problem: Flaky failure in assert_fails(). Solution: Only used fourth argument if there is a third argument.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/165036ddba1318576a29f75d82fae8c326a48f18|patch 8.2.1483: Vim9: error for using special as number>
patch 8.2.1483: Vim9: error for using special as number

Problem:    Vim9: error for using special as number when returning "false"
            from a popup filter.
Solution:   Use tv_get_bool(). (closes #6733)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1483: Vim9: error for using special as number · vim/vim@165036d
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1483: Vim9: error for using special as number · vim/vim@165036d
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: error for using special as number when returning "false" from a popup filter. Solution: Use tv_get_bool(). (closes #6733)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/aeb2bdd0de5ce5b566509dda5ba9ad6f976063b3|patch 8.2.1482: Vim9: crash when using a nested lambda>
patch 8.2.1482: Vim9: crash when using a nested lambda

Problem:    Vim9: crash when using a nested lambda.
Solution:   Do not clear the growarray when not evaluating.  Correct pointer
when getting the next line. (closes #6731)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1482: Vim9: crash when using a nested lambda · vim/vim@aeb2bdd
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1482: Vim9: crash when using a nested lambda · vim/vim@aeb2bdd
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: crash when using a nested lambda. Solution: Do not clear the growarray when not evaluating. Correct pointer when getting the next line. (closes #6731)

patch 8.2.1481: Vim9: line number reported with error may be wrong

Solution:   Check line number in tests.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/e15eebd202e739ec7821a0e9c2aa72a445668bb8|patch 8.2.1480: Vim9: skip expression in search() gives error>
patch 8.2.1480: Vim9: skip expression in search() gives error

Problem:    Vim9: skip expression in search() gives error.
Solution:   use tv_get_bool() eval_expr_to_bool(). (closes #6729)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1480: Vim9: skip expression in search() gives error · vim/vim@e15eebd
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1480: Vim9: skip expression in search() gives error · vim/vim@e15eebd
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: skip expression in search() gives error. Solution: use tv_get_bool() eval_expr_to_bool(). (closes #6729)
